review: Can't say enough about Fire TV! As an avid Android user, I love this device! I cancelled my DirecTV service after my contract ran out and have officially gone to an all-streaming household with this as one of the centerpieces. I love that you can sideload Android apps to it from your PC that don't come from the official store; in this way you can fully customize it as you want, just like any rooted Android device. Almost anything you may want to watch on regular TV, cable service or smart TV has a way to get it working through your Fire TV, whether paid service like Sling TV for cable channels (including standalone HBO without a traditional TV service subscription using HBO Now) like AMC, History, ESPN, etc. or any one of the free apps out there you can install (including ones that aren't necessarily on the up and up, if you know what I mean, but I won't get into that here, that's what search engines are for!)  Of course, Hulu, Netflix and Amazon Prime video are available to use as well as an almost endless amount of other streaming apps. Should have done this a long time ago! Awesome product!
author: Lenny
